LightningComponentBundle.description: Dynamic SLA tracking component that monitors record response times against configured targets

property.name: slaDurationHours
property.label: SLA Duration (Hours)
property.description: Number of hours for the SLA target

property.name: startTimeFieldName
property.label: Start Time Field
property.description: API name of the field that marks the start of SLA time tracking (e.g. CreatedDate)

property.name: endTimeFieldName
property.label: Resolution Time Field
property.description: API name of the field that marks when the SLA was met (e.g. LastModifiedDate)

property.name: statusFieldName
property.label: Status Field
property.description: API name of the field that indicates the current status (e.g. Status__c)

property.name: closedStatusValues
property.label: Closed Status Values
property.description: Comma-separated list of status values that indicate the record is closed (e.g. 'Closed,Completed,Resolved')

property.name: pendingStatusValues
property.label: Paused/Pending Status Values
property.description: Comma-separated list of status values that pause SLA time tracking (e.g. 'Pending,On Hold,Waiting')

property.name: componentTitle
property.label: Component Title
property.description: Title displayed in the component header

property.name: showPastSLA
property.label: Show Past SLA
property.description: When true, displays the component even after SLA has been met or breached

property.name: showProgressBar
property.label: Show Progress Bar
property.description: Display a visual progress bar for SLA tracking

property.name: businessHoursOnly
property.label: Business Hours Only
property.description: Calculate SLA time based on business hours only

property.label: Business Hours ID
